fr.sorbonne_u.components.pre.dcc.interfaces

Interface DynamicComponentCreationI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentServiceI, OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, RequiredI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicComponentCreationConnector, DynamicComponentCreationInboundPort, DynamicComponentCreationOutboundPort

    public interface DynamicComponentCreationI
extends OfferedI, RequiredI
    The interface DynamicComponentCreationI defines the component creation service offered and required interface.

    Description

    This interface is meant to be implemented as an offered interface by dynamic component creator components, and used as required interface by components that want to use this service.

    Created on : 2014-03-13

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String createComponent(java.lang.String classname, java.lang.Object[] constructorParams)
      create a component from the class of the given class name, invoking its constructor matching the given parameters ; beware not to have parameters of base types (int, boolean, etc.) but rather reified versions (Integer, Boolean, etc.) in order for the reflection-based instantiation to work smoothly.

    • Method Detail

      • createComponent

        java.lang.String createComponent(java.lang.String classname,
                                 java.lang.Object[] constructorParams)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        create a component from the class of the given class name, invoking its constructor matching the given parameters ; beware not to have parameters of base types (int, boolean, etc.) but rather reified versions (Integer, Boolean, etc.) in order for the reflection-based instantiation to work smoothly.

        Contract

         pre    classname != null and constructorParams != null
 post   return != null
        Parameters:
        classname - name of the class from which to instantiate the component.
        constructorParams - parameters to be passed to the constructor of the component instantiation class.
        Returns:
        URI of the reflection inbound port of the created component.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - todo.
